Name: Escape From This Planet
About the game: Resources will be close to being backed up for lack of humanity. You have been assigned a journey through space with the responsibility of finding a solution for our planet. But the problem is that this can be a journey of no return. You will travel across planets and encounter strange vegetation and lives that may not like yours. Run away from them and survive this unknown journey. Use your Jet Pack to fly through the level and escape your enemies. Collect minerals to recharge your Jet Pack and energy ores to fuel your ship and escape to the next planet. But that's not all, on each planet there are specific challenges such as meteor showers, volcanoes, cannons and bombs that will attack you when they feel their presence. Remember, we don't have weapons, we need to use escape strategies to dodge all this, collect the items, survive and still escape. What can you expect from this space trip? - An adventure with survival mechanics - Various enemies with different mechanics that generate different results during your escape. - Colorful and beautiful backgrounds with exciting music. - A different strategy for each game attempt. For each level reset, the items in the level change position, thus creating a new strategy for each time you play.
